Text: A Track Piece that goes straight. Can be changed to be a one way signal using the toggle when clicking on it. Creates a track section between one ways that allow a single train to be on it (indicated by the colors).

Will tell trains that they can only go through the green side. Can be changed back to a straight track by using the toggle when clicking on it. Creates a track section between one ways that allow a single train to be on it (indicated by the colors).
Beavers can cross the tracks here. Collision will not be implemented as performance will suffer too much.

A switch in the form of a R for trains.

Text: Allows for transportation of goods by trains. A good can either be send or received at a station. Goods received will only be moved to storages that are set to obtain.
Look at all the goods it can hold.
This stations allows beavers to get on the train and travel to another station that are connected to each other.
When enabled will ONLY allow beavers to go passenger stations that also have this setting enabled and are in other districts.
There are currently no passengers waiting.
Trains can wait here when they have nothing to do. This prevents trains from occupying the tracks. Trains cannot pathfind over this, so make sure its not in any crucial paths.
This is where trains are born.
Are you sure you want to destroy this train?
Distribution set to sending by distribution settings.
Distribution set to receiving by distribution settings.
Completely disable the distribution of this good at this station.
Station can send this good to other station. The maximum amount that can be inside the station is determined by the amount to the right.
Station can receive this good that are sent from other stations. The maximum amount that can be inside the station is determined by the amount to the right.
Decrease the maximum amount that can be inside the station. Click is -1 and holding shift is -10. Max capacity is 200.
Increase the maximum amount that can be inside the station. Click is +1 and holding shift is +10. Max capacity is 200.
